sections: Get things done in comfort and style.
It used to be heavy-duty trucks were always uncomfortable and a little on the ugly side of things. Those days are over as clearly evidenced by this
. Incredibly capable, loaded with style, and just as luxurious as a European sedan, you could win this pickup and park it in your driveway. It’s being offered through Dream Giveaway
, and just because you’re a Motorious reader you get double the entries for your charitable donation by

That’s right, you’re helping out charities while also having the chance to own this amazing GMC Sierra 3500 HD Denali. This isn’t some wimpy little pickup, it’s a one-ton truck with the hard-hitting Duramax turbo-diesel engine. You can tow all kinds of things, thanks to the monstrous 910 lb.-ft. of torque and 445-horsepower on tap. It even comes with the factory gooseneck/fifth wheel package. Plus, the bed is plenty big for hauling your gear or whatever else you need.

You definitely wouldn’t be suffering rolling around in this Denali. Soft leather seats, an advanced infotainment system, all-weather floor liners, underseat storage compartments, and more await in the spacious cab. The interior of this truck outclasses a lot of cars on the road today, all without sacrificing the raw capability.
, know that Dream Giveaway will pay out $20,000 for the taxes on this truck. That means you don’t have to turn around and immediately sell it or drain your savings if you win.
this 2020 GMC Sierra 3500 HD Denali right now!
